groups.name: immortals.cache
groups.description: Configuration properties for the cache service.

groups.name: immortals.cache.features
groups.description: Feature toggles for compression, encryption, and serialization.

groups.name: immortals.cache.resilience
groups.description: Resilience configuration for circuit breaker, stampede protection, and timeouts.

groups.name: immortals.cache.observability
groups.description: Observability configuration for metrics, health checks, tracing, and logging.

properties.name: immortals.cache.enabled
properties.description: Whether caching is enabled globally.

properties.name: immortals.cache.type
properties.description: Cache type: caffeine, redis, or multi-level.

properties.name: immortals.cache.default-ttl
properties.description: Default time-to-live for cache entries.

properties.name: immortals.cache.caffeine.maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries the Caffeine cache may contain.

properties.name: immortals.cache.caffeine.expire-after-write
properties.description: Time after which Caffeine entries are automatically removed after being written.

properties.name: immortals.cache.caffeine.expire-after-access
properties.description: Time after which Caffeine entries are automatically removed after last access.

properties.name: immortals.cache.caffeine.record-stats
properties.description: Whether to record statistics in Caffeine cache.

properties.name: immortals.cache.caffeine.initial-capacity
properties.description: Initial capacity of the Caffeine cache.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.host
properties.description: Redis server host.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.port
properties.description: Redis server port.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.password
properties.description: Redis password for authentication.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.database
properties.description: Redis database index.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.command-timeout
properties.description: Command timeout for Redis operations.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.use-ssl
properties.description: Whether to use SSL/TLS for Redis connections.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.ssl.trust-store
properties.description: Path to trust store file for SSL.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.ssl.trust-store-password
properties.description: Trust store password for SSL.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.acl.enabled
properties.description: Whether ACL authentication is enabled (Redis 6+).

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.acl.username
properties.description: ACL username for Redis 6+ authentication.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.pool.max-total
properties.description: Maximum number of connections in the pool.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.pool.max-idle
properties.description: Maximum number of idle connections in the pool.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.pool.min-idle
properties.description: Minimum number of idle connections in the pool.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.pipelining.enabled
properties.description: Whether pipelining is enabled for batch operations.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.pipelining.batch-size
properties.description: Batch size for pipelined operations.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.cluster.nodes
properties.description: Cluster node addresses (host:port).

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.cluster.max-redirects
properties.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow in cluster mode.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.sentinel.master
properties.description: Name of the Redis master in sentinel mode.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.sentinel.nodes
properties.description: Sentinel node addresses (host:port).

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.read-strategy.read-from-replica
properties.description: Whether to read from replicas.

properties.name: immortals.cache.redis.read-strategy.replica-preference
properties.description: Replica preference: REPLICA_PREFERRED, REPLICA, MASTER, NEAREST, ANY.

properties.name: immortals.cache.multi-level.distributed-eviction
properties.description: Whether to enable distributed eviction notifications in multi-level cache.

properties.name: immortals.cache.multi-level.eviction-channel
properties.description: Redis channel name for eviction notifications.

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.compression.enabled
properties.description: Whether compression is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.compression.algorithm
properties.description: Compression algorithm (currently only gzip is supported).

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.compression.threshold
properties.description: Minimum size in bytes to trigger compression.

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.encryption.enabled
properties.description: Whether encryption is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.encryption.algorithm
properties.description: Encryption algorithm (currently only AES-GCM is supported).

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.encryption.key
properties.description: Base64-encoded encryption key. Required if encryption is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.encryption.key-size
properties.description: Encryption key size in bits (128, 192, or 256).

properties.name: immortals.cache.features.serialization.strategy
properties.description: Serialization strategy: jackson or java.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.circuit-breaker.enabled
properties.description: Whether circuit breaker is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.circuit-breaker.failure-rate-threshold
properties.description: Failure rate threshold percentage to open the circuit.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.circuit-breaker.wait-duration-in-open-state
properties.description: Wait duration in open state before transitioning to half-open.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.circuit-breaker.sliding-window-size
properties.description: Sliding window size for calculating failure rate.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.circuit-breaker.minimum-number-of-calls
properties.description: Minimum number of calls before calculating failure rate.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.stampede-protection.enabled
properties.description: Whether stampede protection is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.stampede-protection.lock-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for acquiring distributed lock in stampede protection.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.timeout.enabled
properties.description: Whether timeout handling is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.resilience.timeout.operation-timeout
properties.description: Operation timeout duration.

properties.name: immortals.cache.observability.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether metrics collection is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.observability.metrics.prefix
properties.description: Metrics prefix for all cache metrics.

properties.name: immortals.cache.observability.health.enabled
properties.description: Whether health indicator is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.observability.tracing.enabled
properties.description: Whether distributed tracing is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.observability.logging.enabled
properties.description: Whether structured logging is enabled.

properties.name: immortals.cache.observability.logging.include-correlation-id
properties.description: Whether to include correlation IDs in logs.

values.description: Two-tier cache combining Caffeine (L1) and Redis (L2).
